name: Ext_R5_DeviceUsage_category
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DeviceUsage.category for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceUsage.category from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceUsage|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The category of the statement - classifying how the statement is made
element.definition: This attribute indicates a category for the statement - The device statement may be made in an inpatient or outpatient settting (inpatient | outpatient | community | patientspecified).
element.comment: `DeviceUsage.category` has no related element in R4B:DeviceUseStatement

element.short: The category of the statement - classifying how the statement is made
element.definition: This attribute indicates a category for the statement - The device statement may be made in an inpatient or outpatient settting (inpatient | outpatient | community | patientspecified).
element.comment: `DeviceUsage.category` has no related element in R4B:DeviceUseStatement
